law.catch_line: Appellate Procedures for Civil Penalty—Repeat Violator; Time for Correction.

text.section:
Sec. 19-4.5. Appellate Procedures for Civil Penalty—Repeat Violator; Time for Correction.
A repeat violator shall be given seven (7) calendar days from service of the civil violation notice pursuant to Miami-Dade County Code(e) to correct the violation, or to file for an appeal. The appeal shall be in the manner described within the Uniform Civil Violation Notice.
